title: Annual Report for 2025 Released
summary: AUM increased 11.6% over the second half of 2025 to $46,500, SCO Fund, Lexicon report progress during first year of operations, Birdfeeder maintains profitability, Investment Fund restructures student leadership
content: The 2025 Annual Report details our portfolio growth, business performances, and philanthropic milestones over the course of 2025. Download the full release detailing everything that we've accomplished and what's to come.

title: Investment Club Reaches $50,000 in AUM
summary: The Investment Club is pleased to announce that our total assets under management has surpassed $50,000
content: The Investment Club's assets under management has surpassed $50,000 during February of 2026. This marks a 50-fold increase in our AUM since our founding in 2019 by Sam Lazarus. We are incredibly grateful to our sponsors and partners in the form of Mr. Vredeveld, Mr. Stacy, and Morgan Stanley as well as our new sponsor Jane Street. We are also thankful for the support that we have consistently received from the Cincinnati Country Day community and faculty. We are incredibly proud of the work that our students have done and the legacy that they have left. We continue to be committed to the founding ideals of the investment club and hope that our motto: Make Money, Do Good, will continue to shape our community.
